post1.title: COVID-19 in Ireland
post1.content: . Total Confirmed: 4604 . Total Deaths: 137 . Total Recovered: 25 . . Last updated on 2020-04-05 00:25 UTC . . Number of Covid-19 cases per million . The respective population of Ireland, Italy, and Spain is as follows (in millions) [source]: . Ireland : 4.9M | Italy : 60.2M | Spain : 47.1M | . If we plot a figure dividing the total number of cases reported daily by the population (in millions) we can find how many persons are infected per 1 million, which give us a normalized value we could use to understand the severity of the outbreak. . . Data Sources . Government of Ireland [https://www.gov.ie/] | 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 (2019-nCoV) Data Repository by Johns Hopkins CSSE [https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19] | . . Notebook and graphics by Dr. Ernesto Diaz-Aviles, @vedaxLibre AICC BY-SA 4.0, 2020 .
